name: Gods Games
description:
Note: This game can only be played with 2 players localy and requires at least one controller 

Gods' Games

Gods’ Games is a coop boss battle game in which you and one friend are fighting for your lives and the freedom of humanity. Alone you are lost, but together you can fight and end the tyranny of the gods!

Gameplay

The gameplay focuses on strategy as you cooperate to defeat the monsters of each level and dodge their attacks. In a bossfight you will have to think how you can use the environment to damage the boss as attacking directly will often be impossible especially with only a mere weapon.

Controls

The standard controls are:

MoveRight JoystickW/A/S/DLookLeft JoystickMouseJumpASpaceDashXLeftShiftUse Item Y RightShift

This configuration can be changed however
